dashboard/apps/previewer.fma/bower_components/jquery/src/css/swap.js
define([ "../core" ], function( jQuery ) {

A method for quickly swapping in/out CSS properties to get correct calculations.

jQuery.swap = function( elem, options, callback, args ) { var ret, name, old = {};

Remember the old values, and insert the new ones

for ( name in options ) { old[ name ] = elem.style[ name ]; elem.style[ name ] = options[ name ]; } ret = callback.apply( elem, args || [] );

Revert the old values

for ( name in options ) { elem.style[ name ] = old[ name ]; } return ret; }; return jQuery.swap; });
